headline: FactSet Research Systems (FDS) Valuation After New Multiyear Barclays Agreement
summary: Barclays has entered a multiyear arrangement with FactSet Research Systems (FDS), using the company’s analytics, data and technology to support its long term market data strategy and services for global clients. See our latest analysis for FactSet Research Systems. The Barclays agreement comes after a tough stretch for shareholders, with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 37.91% and a relatively flat pattern in recent share price returns. This suggests momentum has been subdued even...
